data.name: 2Dark Official Soundtrack and Artbook
data.detailed_description:
Learn about the creative process of Frederick Raynal and the Gloomywood studio with over a hundred previously unpublished illustrations and production secrets. See full colour characters in the preliminary sketches and concept art which were used to create the game.

Original Symphony Soundtrack


“I imagined an unsettling, disturbing score. Music to reflect the imagery of the game.” Composed by Samuel Safa, the 2Dark soundtrack is a musical journey which will take you to the four corners of Gloomywood and to new levels of horror.

01 - Main theme 2Dark
02 - Forest
03 - My home
04 - Enter Gloomyditch
05 - Carlotta, the bearded woman
06 - The Gloomy Ghost Train
07 - Petronelli's Circus
08 - Fight with a vicious clown
09 - Scarlett's tower
10 - Sylvia's Dolls
11 - Dr Ernest Miguele
12 - Normann's house
13 - Le Tango de Lewis
14 - Fight the pig
15 - Back home
16 - Mermaid's Tavern
17 - Scrapyards
18 - Of dogs and kids
19 - Just an orphanage
20 - Helen
21 - It didn't have to be this way…
Composer: Samuel Safa; Publisher: Gloomywood. ©Gloomywood. All rights reserved.

Once downloaded, the Art Book and the Soundtrack can be found in the local files of your Steam library (located by default in C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\2Dark). The Soundtrack can also be accessed from your Steam library, in the “Music” directory.

data.short_description: Dive deep into the world of 2Dark with the original game soundtrack performed by a symphony orchestra, and a digital Art Book which includes over 100 previously unpublished illustrations and production secrets.
